title: Google Toughens Anti-Discrimination Rules for Advertisers
description:
Today is Tuesday, June 16, and we’re looking at Google vs. Facebook.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
